item.title: JBoss JMXInvokerServlet JMXInvoker 0.3 - Remote Command Execution
item.description: JBoss JMXInvokerServlet JMXInvoker 0.3 - 远程代码执行 /* * JBoss JMXInvokerServlet Remote Command Execution * JMXInvoker.java v0.3 - Luca Carettoni @_ikki * * This code exploits a common misconfiguration in JBoss Application Server (4.x, 5.x, ...). * Whenever the JMX Invoker is exposed with the default configuration, a malicious "MarshalledInvocation" * serialized Java object allows to execute arbitrary code.
